title: BENNINGTON 3-PRONG 3.5MM, NANO TURQUOISE AND LAB DIAMOND RIVIÈRE NECKLACE, GOLD
description: Bennington Nano Turquoise is crafted from 3.5MM round nano turquoise stones and accented with a lab-grown diamond. Bennington features a minimal 3-prong 18K gold vermeil setting.
details:
Metal: 18k gold vermeil - a 2.5 micron layer of gold over sterling silver.

Setting: 3-prong
Stone Type: Nano turquoise and lab-grown diamond
Stone Shape: Round cut
Stone Size: 3.5MM
Model pictured is wearing 15 inches Bennington 

Lab-Grown Diamond:

Clarity: VS1

Color: E/F


What is Lab-Grown?
